description.main_subject: Digital presentation slide within a computer application interface
description.detailed_description: A computer screen displays a split-layout presentation slide within a Microsoft Teams-like application. The left panel features bulleted text on a white background, while the right panel shows white text on a solid purple background. The lighting is bright and even, characteristic of a digital display, conveying an informative and educational mood.
